tool_description: Detect and compare human faces. Identify previously tagged people in images. Recognize age, gender, and emotion in the photo.
name: Luxand.cloud Face Recognition
title: Luxand.cloud Face Recognition

api_list.name: List Faces of Person
api_list.description: Returns previously uploaded Faces of Person
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://luxand-cloud-face-recognition.p.rapidapi.com/subject/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "luxand-cloud-face-recognition.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
